page.title: 04Amenities In Bredon
page.content: The biggest facility is the{7 acre {field}with 2 soccer pitches and a cricket square.There are 6 swings and four baby swings,two slides,a round about ,a climbing frame and a set of monkey bars.Standing on the field is a {cricket club}with a bar and changing rooms.The{soccer club}stands near the toilets.And again it has a bar and changing rooms.The{village hall}has a big hall which can stage plays and dances.There is another room called the{Jubilee room}which is used for parties.There is another small room which is the committee room.Also there are good toilet facilities.Outside quite near the village hall is the {bowling club}which has a green which is up to county standard and a good club house and bar.Also there is a {tennis club}which has 2 hard courts and space waiting for development.
